Package ca.concordia.controller.game

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.controller.game.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
Game Engine class that starts with "loadmap" command and automatically ends after mainloop phases

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static boolean GAME_STARTED  
    static java.lang.String ORDER_DEPLOY  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addPlayer​(java.lang.String p_PlayerName)
    takes player name and if there is no player with such name, it adds a new player with this name in playerlist
    boolean assignCountries()
    All countries are assigned randomly to the player
    static GameEngine getInstance​(Map p_Map)
    This is a static method to get the instance of this singleton object
    void loadMapforGame()
    game starts with loading of user-saved map file, which loads the map as a "connected-directed-graph"
    boolean removePlayer​(java.lang.String p_PlayerName)
    takes playerName and if it is found in existing playerlist, remove it .
    void showMapforGame()
    triggers on "showmap" command, this is a different function than MapEditors' showmap commad as it shows extra details like : 1.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static GameEngine getInstance​(Map p_Map)
      This is a static method to get the instance of this singleton object
      Parameters:
      p_Map - map on which the game is starting..
      Returns:
      GameEngine object type

    • loadMapforGame

      public void loadMapforGame()
      game starts with loading of user-saved map file, which loads the map as a "connected-directed-graph"

    • showMapforGame

      public void showMapforGame()
      triggers on "showmap" command, this is a different function than MapEditors' showmap commad as it shows extra details like : 1. show all countries 2. show all continents 3. Armies on each countries 4. Ownership 5. Connectivity in a way that enables game-play

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer​(java.lang.String p_PlayerName)
      takes player name and if there is no player with such name, it adds a new player with this name in playerlist
      Parameters:
      p_PlayerName - playername to add
      Returns:
      boolean

    • removePlayer

      public boolean removePlayer​(java.lang.String p_PlayerName)
      takes playerName and if it is found in existing playerlist, remove it .
      Parameters:
      p_PlayerName - playername to remove
      Returns:
      boolean

    • assignCountries

      public boolean assignCountries()
      All countries are assigned randomly to the player
      Returns:
      boolean
